targets.query: SELECT "runno" FROM "dunedaq.rcif.runinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "runno" > 0) AND $timeFilter

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_total_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tc_received_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_inhibited_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_paused_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_queue_timeout_expired_err_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT mean("tc_data_vs_system_ms") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id" ='${partition}' AND "tc_data_vs_system_ms" < ${year} GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("td_made_vs_ro_window_ms") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("partition_id" ='${partition}') AND "td_made_vs_ro_window_ms"<${year} GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("td_send_vs_ro_start_ms") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("partition_id" ='${partition}') GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("td_send_vs_ro_end_ms") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("partition_id" ='${partition}') GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: TD window boundaries vs system time

targets.query: SELECT mean("data_vs_system_time_ms") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.tpchannelfilterinfo.Info" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("partition_id" ='${partition}') GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT distinct("data_vs_system_in_ms") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.triggergenericmakerinfo.Info" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "data_vs_system_in_ms" < 31536000000 GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT distinct("data_vs_system_out_ms") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.triggergenericmakerinfo.Info" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "data_vs_system_out_ms" < 31536000000 GROUP BY time($__interval) , "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("received_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.tpchannelfilterinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.tpchannelfilterinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("n_received"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.triggerzipperinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("n_sent"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.triggerzipperinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("n_tardy"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.triggerzipperinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("n_cache_occupancy") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.triggerzipperinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval)
SELECT mean("n_zipper_occupancy") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.triggerzipperinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("received_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.triggergenericmakerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}'  AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tam_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.triggergenericmakerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}'  AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tam_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("received_count"),1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.triggergenericmakerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}'  AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tcm_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("sent_count"),1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.triggergenericmakerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}'  AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tcm_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.txbufferinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.ta_[^.]+/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval)

SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.txbufferinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.ta_[^.]+/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval)

SELECT sum("partial") FROM ( SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") AS "partial" FROM "dunedaq.trigger.txbufferinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.ta_[^.]+/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) )

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.ta_buf_\d+_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_handled")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.ta_buf_\d+_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_handled")) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.ta_buf_\d+_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.txbufferinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tc_[^.]+/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval)

SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.txbufferinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tc_[^.]+/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval)

SELECT sum("partial") FROM ( SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") AS "partial" FROM "dunedaq.trigger.txbufferinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.ta_[^.]+/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) )

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tc_buf/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_handled")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tc_buf/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_handled")) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tc_buf/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter
list.label: Partition name
list.name: partition
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter
